publications.title: Video Transcript Extraction and Summarization using Transfer Learning
publications.overview: Developed an AI-powered system for extracting transcripts from video files and summarizing them using advanced transformer models, achieving a 65% reduction in transcript length while maintaining over 85% semantic accuracy.
applications: Automated Summarization of Video Transcripts
Comparative Analysis of Transformer Models for Summarization
Enhancing Video Content Accessibility through AI
AI-Assisted Information Extraction from Audio-Visual Data
Integration of Speech-to-Text with NLP for Content Summarization
extras: Implemented an end-to-end pipeline to extract and preprocess transcripts from video/audio sources using Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR).
Fine-tuned a BART-Large CNN transformer model on the How2 dataset, increasing summarization accuracy by 12% compared to baseline models.
Achieved a 43% ROUGE-1 score and 87.3% BERT Score on the How2 dataset, improving video transcript comprehension efficiency.
Developed an abstractive summarization model that outperformed extractive models by 25% in information retention based on human evaluation.
Integrated an ASR module with moviepy for video-to-audio conversion, reducing speech-to-text processing time by 30%.

publications.title: Intelligent Application of Voice Recognition and Personal Secretariat for Effective Business Management
publications.overview: Developed a mobile application that serves as a personal secretary for small business owners, utilizing voice recognition to manage inventory, sales, and employee records efficiently. The system employs collaborative filtering and association rule mining to provide product recommendations and business insights.
applications: Automated store management using voice commands
Real-time inventory tracking and alerts
Employee attendance and salary management
Product recommendations based on sales patterns
Business insights through data mining and analytics
extras: Designed a user-friendly mobile application interface with voice-based navigation.
Implemented collaborative filtering for personalized product recommendations.
Utilized the Apriori algorithm to identify frequent itemsets and recommend inventory restocking strategies.
Developed a cloud-based data storage system for transaction and employee records.
Integrated real-time notifications for low inventory and payment alerts.

publications.title: Information Extraction and Summarization of Medical Reports using Textract and GPT-2
publications.overview: Developed a system that extracts and summarizes medical reports using AWS Textract for Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and GPT-2 for text summarization. The system processes medical reports, identifies abnormal parameters, and generates an easy-to-understand summary for patients, achieving 91% accuracy in information extraction.
applications: Automated extraction of medical data from reports
Summarization of complex medical terminology into patient-friendly language
Highlighting abnormal medical parameters for easy interpretation
Generating natural remedies and recommendations for health improvement
Improving accessibility to medical reports for rural populations
extras: Implemented AWS Textract for structured medical data extraction.
Developed a medical dictionary with expert-reviewed terminologies.
Created a priority-based dictionary to classify medical conditions.
Leveraged GPT-2 for medical report summarization.
Designed a preprocessing pipeline to improve OCR accuracy.

publications.title: Modified RSA Algorithm using Four Prime Numbers and Double Encryption
publications.overview: This paper proposes a modification of the classic RSA algorithm to enhance security by introducing four prime numbers for key generation, increasing randomness, and employing double encryption with two public and private key pairs. The modified RSA algorithm improves resistance against factorization, low encryption exponent, and brute force attacks while reducing decryption time using the Chinese Remainder Theorem.
applications: Securing internet-based communications from cyber threats
Enhancing digital signature verification and authentication
Providing a more robust encryption method for sensitive data exchange
Reducing decryption time while maintaining strong encryption security
Preventing factorization and brute-force attacks on RSA cryptosystems
extras: Implemented double encryption and decryption using two sets of prime numbers.
Enhanced resistance to brute force attacks by increasing modulus complexity.
Utilized the Chinese Remainder Theorem to optimize decryption time.
Developed an improved public key generation method to prevent low encryption exponent attacks.
Tested the algorithm using Python for performance analysis and security validation.
